articles.title: Dying Hartlepool music lover's friends raise Glastonbury funds - BBC
articles.description: Nigel Stonehouse, 58, says it is his dying wish to get to Glastonbury festival again.
articles.content:
Friends of a festival fan who has weeks left to live are raising funds to fly him by helicopter to Glastonbury to fulfil his "dying wish".
